testcase.failure:
Given user loads the data from "excel" located at "src\test\resources\Fixture\Promo_DB_Data.xlsx".passed Then user launches browser with url "#TestUrl"..............................passed And user enters the Promo code "#Promo Code" in Search box named " Promo / PST / TA Code ".passed And user clicks on the search button........................................passed And user verify that field "Promo code: " field in promo heading............failed And user verify that field "Promotion start to end dates:" field is present.skipped And user verify that field "Is member registration required?" field is present.skipped And user verify that field "Member must register between:" field is present.skipped And user verify that field "Member must travel between:" field is present...skipped And user verify that field "Late registrations may be processed by" field is present.skipped And user verify that field "Is this a targeted promotion?" field is present.skipped And user verify that field "TA codes" field is present......................skipped And user verify that field "Direct mailer:" field is present................skipped And user verify that field "Marketing page URL:" field is present...........skipped And user verify that field "Email URLs:" field is present...................skipped And user verify that field "Partner codes:" field is present................skipped And user verify that field "How to earn" field is present...................skipped And user verify that field "Fulfillment" field is present...................skipped And user verify that field "PST codes:" field is present....................skipped And user verify that field "Resolve issues" field is present................skipped And user verify that field "aa.com view" field is present...................skipped And user verify that field "Terms and conditions" field is present..........skipped
